original_text: He said, “These will be the ways of the king who will reign over you: he will take your sons and appoint them to his chariots and to be his horsemen and to run before his chariots.
korean_text: 이르되 너희를 다스릴 왕의 제도는 이러하니라 그가 너희 아들들을 데려다가 그의 병거와 말을 어거하게 하리니 그들이 그 병거 앞에서 달릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: These will be the ways of the king who will reign over you:
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 다스릴 왕의 행할 길이 곧 이것이라

sentences.original_text: and appoint them to his chariots
and to run before his chariots.
